thread.title: Camila Cabello's acne fears

title: Camila Cabello's acne fears
text:
Camila Cabello admits she was ''afraid'' to meet One Direction because she was worried about her acne. 
Camila Cabello was ''afraid'' to meet One Direction because of her acne. 
The Fifth Harmony star admits she was so nervous to meet the chart-topping boy band because of her skin condition. 
She said: ''The first time I went to the Teen Choice Awards, I remember meeting One Direction and I was afraid to get to close to them. 
''I was so over-thinking it because I thought they would look at my acne and I didn't realise how much acne can take a toll on a kid's self esteem. It got to the point where I couldn't have a conversation with someone.'' 
And the 'Worth It' hitmaker admits it hit her ''like a ton of bricks'' and would be scared to look in the mirror. 
She added to PEOPLE magazine: ''I think that we have all had our fair share of experiences with acne but for me, I actually never had acne until the first time we went on tour and it hit me like a ton of bricks. 
''It was just all over my face and I just remember waking up and looking in the mirror and literally being afraid to look in the mirror because I would just cry. I didn't want to go on stage.'' Contactmusic
